M15/1/AXPUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX




Punjabi A: literature – Standard level – Paper 1
Panjabi A : littérature – Niveau moyen – Épreuve 1
Punyabí A: literatura – Nivel medio – Prueba 1

Friday 8 May 2015 (afternoon)
Vendredi 8 mai 2015 (après-midi)
Viernes 8 de mayo de 2015 (tarde)

1 hour 30 minutes / 1 heure 30 minutes / 1 hora 30 minutos


Instructions to candidates
 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a guided literary analysis on one passage only. In your answer you must address both of
  the guiding questions provided.
 The maximum mark for this examination paper is [20 marks].

Instructions destinées aux candidats
 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez une analyse littéraire dirigée d’un seul des passages. Les deux questions d’orientation
  fournies doivent être traitées dans votre réponse.
 Le nombre maximum de points pour cette épreuve d’examen est de [20 points].

Instrucciones para los alumnos
 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un análisis literario guiado sobre un solo pasaje. Debe abordar las dos preguntas de
  orientación en su respuesta.
 La puntuación máxima para esta prueba de examen es [20 puntos].




                                                                                              2215 – 0627
     4 pages/páginas                                      © International Baccalaureate Organization 2015
                                                       –2–                     M15/1/AXPUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX

isr& ie~k bMd dw inrdyiSq swihqk ivSlySx kro[ Awpxy au~qr iv`c quhwnUM inrdySn krdy id`qy hoey dohW svwlW
bwry zrUr ilKxw cwhIdw hY[

1.


                  Bog vwly idn ivAwh vrgw vwqwvrn sI[grIb-guribAw qy mwV-mMgq leI cOlW dy kVwhy k`Fy gey[
          hlvweI bulw ky l`fuU pkwey gey[ gdOVw vI p`ikAw[ gurU gRMQ swihb dy Bog qoN pihlW ipMf dy swry bwhmxW
          nMU bRhm-Boj id`qw igAw[ hr Gr nMU A`T l`fU, mMUgI dI dwl qy AwluU-CoilAW dI sbzI iek iek kOlI Aqy
          cwr pUrIAW[ ipMf ivc cwlI Gr bwhmxW dy sn[ inauNdw id`qw qy auh k`CW ivc QwlIAW lY ky Aw au`qry[
      5   buVHy-bVHIAW, bwhmxW dIAW bhUuAW qy kuVIAW[ swry ipMf ivc gdOVw PyirAw igAw[ hr Gr nMU cwr-cwr
          l`fU vI[ cwr sO qoN au`qy idhlI dw ipMf sI, koTy KVk isMG[ Bog au`qy swrw ipMf AwieAw[ bwby dy pRSwd
          qoN bwAd jwx vwly nUM l`fUAW dw l&w&w vI id`qw jWdw[ irSqydwrW nUM q`kVI nwl qol qol l`fU id`qy gey[
          koTy KVk isMG qW kI, nyV-pvyhy ivc vI rswldwr krm isMG dy hkwmy dI b`ly-b`ly hox l`gI[ lok m`lx dy
          Drmwqmw hox dIAW g`lW krdy[ ‘cMgw eI AY BweI, ijMnw Awvdy h`Q nwl puMn-dwn ho jy[ AglI drgwh
     10   ’c qW iehI cIj jWdI AY nwl[ iksy p`uq ny nwl nI jwxw, DI ny nI jwxw, bMdy dI nykI nwl jWdI AY[hor
          sB kus eyQy eI rih jWdY[’
                  koeI AwKdw, ‘EhI kr skdY BweI, AYnw kus, jIhdy AMdr ig`l hoaU[ mwVw-DIVw kI kr lU[ EhI
          krU, jIhdI koTI ’c dwxy hoxgy[’
                  qy koeI hOlI dy ky BWfw BMndw, ‘AMdrlI i`g`l nUM qW jwxdy AW iehdI nUM[ JMfy dI bhI dyK lo jw ky,
     15   jIhny dyKxI AY[ srIkW ’qy roAb pONdY[ AYN DONs nI KVHI hMudI[ corI dy p`uq g`BrU hoey AY kdy[’
                  qy Pyr g`l nMU moVw pYx lgdw, ‘Awvdw Gr gwl ky n`k r`iKAw qW kwhdw r`iKAw[ iek idn n`k eI
          n`k rih jU p`ly[ Ajy qW kuVI dw ivAwh ipAY isr ’qy[ iek hor AY, EdMU CotI, dyK lW gy iehnUM; ieko l`q
          jWdy nUM[’
                  A`T hzwr ijhVw JMfy qoN ilAw sI, swrw buVHy dy hkwmy au`qy l`g igAw[ kuVI dw ivAwh isr au`qy
     20   ipAw sI[ ml`x sIrI nUM lY ky twhlI vwly Kyq jwNdw qy auh dovyN cu`p-cupIqy hI kxk g`ufx lgdy[ auhnwN
          drimAwn kdy kdy hI koeI g`l h`MdI[ sIrI socdw rihMdw, ‘jmInW Awly lok ikhVw suKI ny[ AYmNy Pokw eI
          j`t dw rMgVaU huMdY, AMdroN qW pol eI pol AY[ AKy–rswldwr ky beI rswldwr ky[ Awh Dr ilAw vwFw
          vwhx nUM[ c`l, AwpW nUM kI? Agly swl hor iksy nwl rl jW gy[’ qy Pyr qyjU AMdwzw lwaux lgdw ik
          auhnUM hwVI dy ikMny ku dwxy eys vwr Aw jwxgy[
     25           ‘ikauN qyjU ikMnI ku kxk ho jU qyrI q`k ’c?’ m`lx vI Awpxy idmwg ivc ijvyN iehI soc irhw huMdw[
                  qyjU ksIAw T`lH ky KVH jWdw qy swry Kyq v`l qrdI-qrdI nzr mwrdw[ AwKdw, ‘kI kih skdy AW[
          dyKo’[
                  qyjU Awpxy icq ivc hI pUry ds GumW dw AMdwzw lwauNdw[ auhnUM ih`sw qW ds GmW dw hI imlxw sI[
          pr m`lx A`T GumW bwry socdw socdw do GumW dw Jorw krn lgdw[ auh AMdry kuVHdw, ‘bwpU jy nw mrdw qW
     30   hwVHI dI Psl vyc ky ieh do GumW qW bySk Cufw eI lYNdy[ mHYs ivk jWdI[ QoVw-Gxw rupeIAw hor mukMdI qo
          ivAwjU lY lYNdy[ AYs swl AOKy ho lYNdy, hor kI? A`T hzwr ijhVw bwpU au`qy l`g igAw, auhdy nwl kuVI dw
          ivAwh PMny ho jWdw[ P`kI au`f jWdI kyrW qW[ auh socdw, do GumW jy Blw nw vI CutdI, qW hwVI dI Psl
          vyc ky mukMdI dw A`D qW in`bV jWdw[ hux qW nw Es pwsy, nw Es pwsy, ivcwly ltkdy rih gey’[
                  qy Pyr jdoN ‘m`lx isAW’ kih ky qyjU auhdy nwl koeI hor gl krdw qW auh cOVw ijhw ho jWdw[ auhdy
     35   ivc auhdw AMdrlw j`t jwg pYNdw[ auh hOslw r`K ky bolx lgdw[ g`lW ivcoN g`l auTdI qW m`lx DOx
          AkVw ky AwKdw, ‘pYsy dw kIh AY, pYsw qW AONdw rihMdY jWdw rihMdY[ Krc krn nUM idl cwihdY[ mwVy idl
          Awlw qW duAwnI nI lw skdw[ jmIn gihxy Drn dw koeI myHxw nI[ jIhdy kol hoaU, EhI DrU[ nMg kI
          gihxy Dr dU[ dyiKAw, hkwmw kIqw[ hux srIk swlw koeI bol nI skdw[ bol skdY?’
                                                     –3–                      M15/1/AXPUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX


               qy Pyr auh hOslw idKwauNdw, ‘hux kuVI dw ivAwh vI dyK lIN[ srIk qW DI dy jwr cWBVW pONdy hoxgy,
40      cMgw hoieAw ivAwh Dry qoN buVHw mr igAw[ pr ieh nI pqw, ieh m`lx isEN AY[ iek kI BwmyN do buVHy mr
        jWdy, kuVI dw ivAwh qW Efo-kYf eI hoaugw[ qMU dyKIN shI, muslI AMnHI kr idAWgy[ pYsw qW swlw h`QW
        dI mYl AY[ Awpy dyaU s`cw pwSw[’ qy Pyr mn ivc hI kihx lgdw, ‘EhI AY krn Awlw, EhI smwrU swry
        kwj[’
                                                                 rwm sruUp AxKI. koTy KVk isMG, AYfISn (2010)


     (a) auprokq pYryH iv`c Ajoky pMjwbI pyNfU jIvn dI ie`k qsvIr pRwpq huMdI hY[ crcw kro[

     (b)   ies pYrHy iv`c vrqI geI BwSw Aqy SYlI bwry qusIN kI kihxw cwhuMdy ho?




                                                              Turn over / Tournez la page / Véase al dorso
                                                  –4–                      M15/1/AXPUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX

2.


                              ies ngr iv`c dosqI qy duSmxI dI loV hY[
                              p~QrW iv`c KoV eyQy SIiSAW iv`c joV hY[
                              jy hvw dy moiFAW qy iKV pvW lihr pvW[
                              b`s quhwfI Du~p CW dI hI zrw ku loV hY[
                          5   myry Gr phuMcx qoN pihlW roz fu`b jWdw hY idn
                              koeI vI sUrj nw myry nwl pu`jw qoV hY[
                              izMdgI dI rwh qoN muSikl nhIN hY pulsrwq[
                              hr kdm ie`k hwdsw hY hr kdm ie`k moV hY[
                              kuJ plW dw in~G hY ieh kuJ plW dI nyVqw[
                         10   aus nUM myrI loV A~j k`lH mYnUM aus dI loV hY[
                              JIl hY, rMgW dw mylw hY, crwgW dw smW,
                              ies smyN vI ho rhI mihsUs qyrI QoV hY[

                                                            fwktr jgqwr, zMzIrW iv`c iGirAw smuMdr (1985)



     (a) kivqw ilKx leI kvI v`loN vrqI bolI bwry it`pxI kro[

     (b)   kivqw ilKx dy ies FMg rwhIN kvI AwpxI g`l ikMnI ku s&lqw nwl kih sikAw hY[
